author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:04.63] It feels like a perfect night
[00:07.02] To dress up like hipsters
[00:09.34] And make fun of our exes

[00:13.94] It feels like a perfect night

[00:18.34] To fall in love with strangers
[00:21.04] Ah-ah, ah-ah
[00:23.29] Yeah, we're happy, free, confused and lonely at the same time
[00:29.49] It's miserable and magical, oh yeah
[00:34.15] Tonight's the night when we forget about the deadlines
[00:38.64] It's time, oh-oh
[00:41.91] I don't know about you
[00:43.83] But I'm feeling 22

[00:51.25] You don't know about me
[00:53.00] But I'll bet you want to
[00:55.26] Everything will be alright if
